post:
Hello and Merry Christmas!

We have taken your demand and now have Los Angeles KVM VPS nodes available! You can now order any KVM VPS plan we offer in Los Angeles on new Ryzen 9 3900x CPUs with NVMe SSDs in RAID. For Christmas, we will be offering 60% off lifetime on any of our Los Angeles KVM Servers. 

Our base plan is:
Memory 1GB
1 CPU
20GB NVMe Storage
500GB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
Gigabit Connection
Los Angeles Datacentre
**$2.40USD/M** (Originally $6/mo)
[Order Link](https://billing.serversgalore.com.au/cart.php?a=add&pid=382&currency=2 "Order Link")

Most popular plan:
Memory 8GB
4 CPU
90GB NVMe Storage
4TB Bandwidth
1 IPv4
Gigabit Connection
Los Angeles Datacentre
**$18/USD/M** (Originally $45/mo)
[Order Link](https://billing.serversgalore.com.au/cart.php?a=add&pid=388&currency=2 "Order Link")

Check our our Trustpilot reviews https://au.trustpilot.com/review/serversgalore.com.au
